PreCommit.name: prevent-factory-droid-coauthor
PreCommit.description: Prevents adding factory-droid[bot] as co-author in commits
PreCommit.command: bash -c 'if git log -1 --pretty=%B | grep -q "factory-droid\[bot\]"; then echo "Error: factory-droid[bot] co-author is not allowed in commits"; exit 1; fi'
